titleStmt.title: A great fight in VVales between Collonell Horton and Collonell Powel: and the number of those that are slaine and taken prisoners : with the names of the chief. Also the manner of that, and other fights, between both armies. With the taking of Brecknock. And 10 considerable officers and divers prisoners May 3. 1648. Imprimatur Gil. Mabbot.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Ibbitson in Smithfield, neere the Queens-head Tavern,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
